originalTitle: Family of Zambia's ex-President Lungu dismiss poisoning allegation - lawyers
title: Family of Zambia's ex-President Lungu dismiss poisoning allegation - lawyers
content: It is the latest twist over the fate of Lungu's body, which remains in a South African morgue since his death.

originalTitle: US soldiers arrive in Nigeria to aid its fight against Islamist militants
title: US soldiers arrive in Nigeria to aid its fight against Islamist militants
content: The troops, who landed at an airfield in Bauchi state, will not take part in combat operations, officials say.

originalTitle: Strike deal reached after two days of chaos at Kenya's main airport
title: Strike deal reached after two days of chaos at Kenya's main airport
content: Passengers are still being urged to check their flight status before heading to the crowded airport.

originalTitle: Who should control our digital world?
title: Who should control our digital world?
content: A few tech corporations control most of the world's data. Some countries have been fighting to change that.

originalTitle: Tarique Rahman sworn in as Prime Minister of Bangladesh
title: Tarique Rahman sworn in as Prime Minister of Bangladesh
content: Bangladesh is marking a historic new chapter as Tarique Rahman is sworn in as Prime Minister.

originalTitle: US kills 11 people in three strikes on alleged drug-trafficking vessels
title: US kills 11 people in three strikes on alleged drug-trafficking vessels
content: President Donald Trump's campaign against alleged drug boats has resulted in at least 145 deaths since September.

originalTitle: Jesse Jackson: A life in pictures
title: Jesse Jackson: A life in pictures
content: A look back at the remarkable life of the US civil rights activist, who died on Tuesday aged 84.

originalTitle: First day of Russia-Ukraine peace talks ends in Geneva
title: First day of Russia-Ukraine peace talks ends in Geneva
content: Negotiations will continue on Wednesday, but expectations for a breakthrough on ending the war are low.

originalTitle: No DNA matches on glove found in Nancy Guthrie case, police say
title: No DNA matches on glove found in Nancy Guthrie case, police say
content: It's been two weeks since the 84 year old's disappearance and authorities say there have not been any arrests

originalTitle: Arsenal make Saka best-paid player with new five-year deal
title: Arsenal make Saka best-paid player with new five-year deal
content: England winger Bukayo Saka commits his future to Premier League leaders Arsenal by signing a new five-year deal.

originalTitle: 'We really messed up' - does European football need more balance?
title: 'We really messed up' - does European football need more balance?
content: One set of clubs dominate the Champions League, another win their domestic title every year but cannot compete - does European football have a problem?

originalTitle: 'We created fire' - Forest boss Pereira on Marinakis reunion
title: 'We created fire' - Forest boss Pereira on Marinakis reunion
content: Nottingham Forest boss Vitor Pereira says "he trusts my work, I trust his personality" as he is reunited with Evangelos Marinakis.
